item.title: Derek Hough Named Host of ‘Extra,’ Replacing Billy Bush
item.description: The former ‘Dancing With the Stars’ pro will join the syndicated show for its 32nd season.

item.title: ‘Extra’ Lays Off Staffers Ahead of Season 32 (Exclusive)
item.description: It’s understood that the syndicated entertainment newsmagazine is getting a revamp for its new season.
